description: "Ensembl is a genome browser for vertebrates."
"UCSC Genome Browser is a web-based genome browser hosted by the University of California
"Phytozome is a comparative hub for plant genome and gene family data."
"The Animal Genome Size Database provides information on genome size for thousands of species."
"The Plant DNA C-values contains C-values for plant species"
"OMIM is a catalog of human genes and genetic disorders."
"RefSeq is a set of reference sequences including unicellular organisms."
"KEGG is a database resource for understanding high-level functions and utilities of the biological system."
